original_solution_mapping.L1: If in five years, Hania will be 45 years old, currently she is 45-5 = <<45-5=40>>40 years old.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Ten years ago, Hania was 40-10 = <<40-10=30>>30 years old.
original_solution_mapping.L3: Samir just turned half the age Hania was 10 years ago, which means she is 30/2 = <<30/2=15>>15 years old.
original_solution_mapping.L4: In five years, Samir will be 15+5 = <<15+5=20>>20 years old

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 2315.
    Returns: Samir's age five years from now.
    """
    # L1
    future_hania_age = 45 # Hania will be 45 years old
    future_years = 5 # in five years
    current_hania_age = future_hania_age - future_years

    # L2
    years_ago = 10 # 10 years ago
    hania_age_ten_years_ago = current_hania_age - years_ago

    # L3
    half_divisor = 2 # half the age
    samir_current_age = hania_age_ten_years_ago / half_divisor

    # L4
    samir_future_age = samir_current_age + future_years

    # FA
    answer = samir_future_age
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: If in five years, Hania will be {future_hania_age} years old, currently she is {future_hania_age}-{future_years} = <<{future_hania_age}-{future_years}={current_hania_age}>>{current_hania_age} years old.
Ten years ago, Hania was {current_hania_age}-{years_ago} = <<{current_hania_age}-{years_ago}={hania_age_ten_years_ago}>>{hania_age_ten_years_ago} years old.

Samir just turned half the age Hania was 10 years ago, which means she is {hania_age_ten_years_ago}/{half_divisor} = <<{hania_age_ten_years_ago}/{half_divisor}={samir_current_age}>>{samir_current_age} years old.
In five years, Samir will be {samir_current_age}+{future_years} = <<{samir_current_age}+{future_years}={samir_future_age}>>{samir_future_age} years old

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: Ten years ago, Hania was 40-10 = <<40-10=30>>30 years old.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Samir just turned half the age Hania was 10 years ago, which means she is 30/2 = <<30/2=15>>15 years old.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: In five years, Samir will be 15+45 = <<15+45=60>>60 years old

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'future_hania_age' (45) was used instead of 'future_years' (5).
